DataElement.preferredName: Patient Questionnaire Chlorhexidine Gluconate Cleansing Cloth Satisfaction Review Unsatisfaction Usage Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an explanation of cleansing cloths not satified to use from patient's evaluation of using cloths contain chlorhexidine gluconate to clean infection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Questionnaire Chlorhexidine Gluconate Cleansing Cloth Satisfaction Review
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to ask patient the satisfaction evaluation of using cloths contain chlorhexidine gluconate to clean infection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Chlorhexidine Gluconate CLEANSING CLOTH Satisfaction Review
Property.preferredDefinition: The gluconate salt form of chlorhexidine, a biguanide compound used as an antiseptic agent with topical antibacterial activity. Chlorhexidine gluconate is positively charged and reacts with the negatively charged microbial cell surface, thereby destroying the integrity of the cell membrane. Subsequently, chlorhexidine gluconate penetrates into the cell and causes leakage of intracellular components leading to cell death. Since gram positive bacteria are more negatively charged, they are more sensitive to this agent.:No Value Exists:The feeling of being pleased and content.:The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.

Concepts.definition: The gluconate salt form of chlorhexidine, a biguanide compound used as an antiseptic agent with topical antibacterial activity. Chlorhexidine gluconate is positively charged and reacts with the negatively charged microbial cell surface, thereby destroying the integrity of the cell membrane. Subsequently, chlorhexidine gluconate penetrates into the cell and causes leakage of intracellular components leading to cell death. Since gram positive bacteria are more negatively charged, they are more sensitive to this agent.
The feeling of being pleased and content.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
